text:
inpher.io | Privacy Preserving Analytics | New York (USA), Lausanne (Switzerland), Paris (France) | ONSITE

Experienced software engineers: We are a startup developing a novel technology for privacy preserving analytics. We are seeking high performing individuals that will work on the design and development of our XOR Secret Computing™ Engine. You should have proven experience with development of large software systems as well as taking responsibility for testing and reviewing code and customer facing roles. You will join a smart, geographically distributed development team. Other open positions include:

- Data Scientists and Machine Learning experts

- Applied cryptography engineers, UI/UX designers and developers

- Technical Business Development

…and more

Have we made you curious? Send your resume to: careers@inpher.io.
